item.title: Philippines Country Data
item.description: I created this poster for the Information Design course at Northeastern University. We were asked to present 30 pieces of information about a country.

item.title: Climate Change Poster
item.description: This dramatic poster uses data from climate.nasa.gov to showcase evidence of climate change, with a focus on melting polar ice caps. When I learned about global warming as a kid, I remember feeling a powerful urgency to try and change things. I tried to create an attention-grabbing poster that would both inform viewers and get them equally concerned about this issue. I created this poster for the Typography II course at Northeastern University.
